name: Traditional Lehnga Haldi
description: Bright yellow lehnga with classic embroidery and a soft dupatta, perfect for a daytime haldi ceremony.

name: Floral Embroidered Lehnga Haldi
description: Floral threadwork on a lightweight skirt, designed for easy movement during pre-wedding rituals.

name: Modern Style Lehnga Haldi
description: Modern cut with subtle shimmer accents and a neat blouse, ideal for photos and family gatherings.

name: Handcrafted Lehnga Haldi
description: Hand-finished gota and zari work on a flared skirt, paired with a contrast dupatta.

name: Elegant Silk Lehnga Haldi
description: Silk-blend lehnga with delicate embroidery and a smooth finish for a polished haldi look.

name: Vibrant Printed Lehnga Haldi
description: Vibrant printed lehnga with breathable fabric, made for long ceremonies and outdoor functions.

name: Classic Yellow Lehnga Haldi
description: Classic yellow lehnga with traditional borders and a light dupatta for a timeless haldi look.

name: Designer Lehnga Haldi
description: Designer lehnga with statement embroidery and a structured blouse for a standout entry.

name: Comfort Fit Lehnga Haldi
description: Comfort-fit lehnga with soft lining and easy drape, great for long ceremonies and photos.
